meanings.definition: Wide or broad in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The road was so ancho that two cars could easily drive side by side.
meanings.sent2: The ancho river flowed gently through the valley.
meanings.sent3: The ancho hat made him look like a giant mushroom!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as ancho as the horizon at sunset.
meanings.sent5: The ancho tree provided ample shade on hot summer days.
